_comments.devices: Array of I4 Plus devices to deploy to
_comments.name: Friendly name for your reference
_comments.ip: IP address or mDNS hostname (format: MACADDRESS.shelly.home)
_comments.enabled: Optional boolean to enable/disable deployment to this device. Defaults to true if omitted. Set to false to skip during deployment.
_comments.controls: Array of exactly 4 objects (one per I4 input), in order: Input 0, 1, 2, 3
_comments.controls.ip: IP/hostname of device to control, or 0.0.0.0 to disable
_comments.controls.type: Device type: 'dimmer' for dimmers (Dimmer Gen3, Pro Dimmer), 'switch' for non-dimmers (Mini Gen 3, Plus 1PM). Defaults to 'dimmer' if omitted.
_comments.scriptName: Name for the script on device
